```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
library(feather)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(reticulate)
library(entropy)
library(tidyboot)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

```{r readfeather}
framed_childes <- 
  read_feather(here("childlanguageinfo/childes_parsed_frames.feather")) %>%
  mutate(transcript_id = as.numeric(transcript_id),
         utterance_order = as.numeric(utterance_order),
         target_child_age = as.numeric(target_child_age)) %>%
  filter(target_child_age <= 60) %>%
  filter(!str_detect(gloss, "yyy"),!str_detect(gloss, "xxx"),
         !is.na(target_child_age)) %>%
  mutate(speaker_code = ifelse(speaker_code == "MOM", "MOT", speaker_code),
         speaker_code = ifelse(speaker_code == "DAD", "FAT", speaker_code))
```

```{r filter}
par_child <- framed_childes %>%
  mutate(speaker_code_2 = ifelse(speaker_code == "MOT" | speaker_code == "FAT", "PAR", speaker_code))

valid_transcripts <- par_child %>%
  filter(speaker_code_2 == "CHI" | speaker_code_2 == "PAR") %>%
  group_by(transcript_id) %>%
  count() %>%
  filter(n > 100)

more_valid_transcripts <- par_child %>%
  filter(speaker_code_2 == "CHI" | speaker_code_2 == "PAR") %>%
  group_by(speaker_code_2, transcript_id) %>%
  count() %>%
  filter(n > 10)

valid_utt <- framed_childes %>%
  group_by(utt_parse) %>%
  count() %>%
  filter(n > 300)
```

```{r clean}
children_with_ages <- par_child %>%
  filter(speaker_code_2 == "CHI" | speaker_code_2 == "PAR") %>%
  mutate(basic_age = floor(target_child_age)) %>%
  filter(transcript_id %in% valid_transcripts$transcript_id) %>%
  filter(transcript_id %in% more_valid_transcripts$transcript_id) %>%
  filter(utt_parse %in% valid_utt$utt_parse)
```

```{r word}
s1 <- strsplit(children_with_ages$gloss, split = " ")
separate_data2 <- data.frame(transcript_id = rep(children_with_ages$transcript_id, sapply(s1, length)),
           speaker_code = rep(children_with_ages$speaker_code_2, sapply(s1, length)),
           basic_age = rep(children_with_ages$basic_age, sapply(s1, length)),
           word = unlist(s1))

count_vector_gloss <- separate_data2 %>%
  group_by(word, basic_age, transcript_id, speaker_code) %>%
  count()
```

```{r entropy_word}
entrop_vector_gloss <- count_vector_gloss %>%
  group_by(transcript_id, speaker_code) %>%
  mutate(entropy = entropy(n)) %>%
  summarise(entropy = first(entropy), age = first(basic_age))
```


```{r word-pos}
s2 <- strsplit(children_with_ages$utt_parse, split = " ")
separate_data <- data.frame(transcript_id = rep(children_with_ages$transcript_id, sapply(s2, length)),
           speaker_code = rep(children_with_ages$speaker_code_2, sapply(s2, length)),
           basic_age = rep(children_with_ages$basic_age, sapply(s2, length)),
           word_pos = unlist(s2))

count_vector_word_pos <- separate_data %>%
  group_by(word_pos, basic_age, transcript_id, speaker_code) %>%
  count()
```

```{r entropy_word-pos}
entrop_vector_word_pos <- count_vector_word_pos %>%
  group_by(transcript_id, speaker_code) %>%
  mutate(entropy = entropy(n)) %>%
  summarise(entropy = first(entropy), age = first(basic_age))
```

```{r graph_word}
entrop_vector_word_pos %>%
  ggplot(aes(age, entropy, color = speaker_code)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.08) +
  geom_smooth(aes(label = "words")) + 
  geom_point(data = entrop_vector_gloss, alpha = 0.08) +
  geom_smooth(data = entrop_vector_gloss) +
  ylab("Entropy") +
  xlab("Exact Age") +
  ggtitle("Entropy of Words and Parsed Tokens") +
  theme_classic()
```

```{r compare}
x <- entrop_vector_word_pos %>%
  filter(speaker_code == "CHI") %>%
  mutate(x = entropy) 
x <- x[,c(1, 4, 5)]

y <- entrop_vector_word_pos %>%
  filter(speaker_code == "PAR") %>%
  mutate(y = entropy)
y <- y[,c(1, 4, 5)]

new_entrop <- merge(x, y)
```

```{r graph2}
new_entrop %>%
  ggplot(aes(x, y, color = age)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  xlab("Child Entropy") +
  ylab("Mother Entropy") +
  ggtitle("Entropy (POS tags) Between Conversational Partners") +
  theme_classic() +
  scale_color_gradient(low="lightblue1", high="blue")
```

```{r graph_facet_year}
new_entrop <- new_entrop %>%
  mutate(year = floor(age / 12))

new_entrop %>%
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  facet_wrap(~year) +
  xlab("Child Entropy") +
  ylab("Mother Entropy") +
  ggtitle("Entropy Between Conversation Partners (yearly, by parsed tokens)")
```

```{r graph_facet}
new_entrop %>%
  filter(age <= 16) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  facet_wrap(~age) +
  xlab("Child Entropy") +
  ylab("Mother Entropy")
```

```{r graph_facet2}
new_entrop %>%

```
